author: That kid
content: Can we please have a final in this class

author: Dr. Montgomery
content: Update: I will not have the midterm exams for you in class this Friday. We have too many design patterns to go over. Your midterms will be handed back to you in class on Monday

author: Dr. Montgomery
content: The graders have been working hard to get your midterm grades back to you. I should have them for you in class on Friday.

author: Manjunath
content: No, no quiz needed for that

author: Student who wasn't paying attention
content: But do we need to submit a quiz on that day as well?

author: Dr. Montgomery
content: No, you don't. Please just submit 30 minutes worth of content
